Name: Strix STG
About the game: 'Strix STG' is a 'Communication-Synchronized Bullet-Hell Casual Vertical-Scrolling Shooting-Game'. Let's aim to capture all 5 stages while destroying enemies. You can also choose from 5 levels of difficulty. * Up to stage 2 has been implemented at the start of early access. * There is a possibility that the contents of the stage will be changed until the final version is released. The best feature of this game is the ability to play two-player co-op online. Simple chat with two types of fixed phrases is available, so please use it for role sharing. * Currently, there is no save function for play data, so it is not possible to record the score. I may add a save function in the future based on user feedback. Method of operation menu SHOT key (Z key): Confirm BOMB key (X key): cancel AUTO-SHOT key (C key): Confirm In-game SHOT key (Z key): shot BOMB key (X key): bomb AUTO-SHOT key (C key): Shot START key (ESC key): Pause menu (single play only) COMM1 key (A key): Send the message 'Leave the small enemy to me!' (co-op play only) COMM2 key (S key): Send the message 'Leave the large enemy to me!' (co-op play only) Common F4 key : Force quit the application This game supports some game controllers. (Only 'Real Arcade Pro.V HAYABUSA' has been confirmed to work.) If you have a compatible controller, you can assign any key. Powered by 'Strix Cloud'. Strix CloudÂ® is a registered trademark of Soft Gear Co., Ltd. in Japan
